questions.answer: Food should not be wasted because many people do not get enough food.

questions.question: What do we learn from food?
questions.answer: Food teaches us the value of sharing and respect.

questions.question: Why is food important?
questions.answer: Food keeps us alive and healthy.

questions.question: Who works hard to give us food?
questions.answer: Farmers work hard to grow food.

questions.question: Why should we take limited food in our plate?
questions.answer: Taking limited food helps reduce wastage.

questions.question: What should we do with leftover food?
questions.answer: Leftover food should be reused or shared.

questions.question: Why should children respect food?
questions.answer: Food is precious and comes from hard work.

questions.question: How does food wastage affect others?
questions.answer: It reduces food available for others.

questions.question: Why should we finish the food we take?
What habit helps save food?
questions.answer: Taking only needed food helps save it.
